action Class

Defined in: lib/api/action.js:10
Module: action
Parent Module: arango

The api module "action" to define user actions in ArangoDB.

  • Index
  • Methods

Item Index

Methods

  • define
  • getActions
  • submit
  • undefine

Methods

define

(
  • o
  • [f]
  • [reload]
)
None

Defined in lib/api/action.js:21

Defines an action.

Parameters:

  • o Object
    • Object containing the action mandatory and optional settings.
    • name String
      • The name of the action.
    • url String
      • The url of the action.
    • method String
      • The method of the action.
    • [result] String optional
      • A function called if a result has been returned.
    • [error] String optional
      • A function called if an error occured.
  • [f] String optional
    • A function to be executed on the server.
  • [reload] String optional
    • If true, the routes will be reloaded.

Returns:

None:

getActions

() Object

Defined in lib/api/action.js:156

returns all actions currently available.

Returns:

Object:

submit

(
  • actionName
  • [data]
  • [callback]
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/action.js:119

Executes an action and returns a promise.

Parameters:

  • actionName String
    • Name of the action to be executed.
  • [data] Object optional
    • Data passed to the action.
  • [callback] Function optional
    • Callback function.

Returns:

Promise:

undefine

(
  • actionName
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/action.js:135

deletes an action and its route if existing.

Parameters:

  • actionName String
    • Name of the action to be executed.

Returns:

Promise:
